full_summary:
### Solicitation for Right Click Tools License
#### Solicitation Reference Number: SSC-23-00024484
#### Amendment Number: 1
#### Solicitation Number: BPM020050/24484

#### Publication Date: 16 November 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: 30 November 2023, 2:00 PM EST
#### Amendment Date: 29 November 2023

#### Solicitation Description
This solicitation invites bidders to provide a Right Click Tools license and related technical specifications to Shared Services Canada (SSC).

#### Business Requirements
* Competition Method: Open Bidding (Competitive)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Locations
* Opportunity Region: Canada
* Delivery Region: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

#### Contractor Information
* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON, Canada K0A 0C3
* Contact Person: Clara Whittaker
* Phone: 343-553-8354
* Email: [Not Available]

#### Documentation
The solicitation documentation, including this amendment, is available for download from the SSC P2P portal.

#### Registration and Submission Instructions
To register and submit a response to this solicitation, please visit the SSC P2P portal website at [Supplier Login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) and follow the registration instructions.

Note: The expected contract start and end dates are not specified in the original documentation. I assumed it was not relevant to the tender announcement, so I did not include it in the rewritten entry. If it is required, please let me know the information. You can add it to the solicitation description or a separate section.
